channel.title: Encoding on ppalazon
channel.description: Recent content in Encoding on ppalazon

item.title: Character encoding files
item.description: Suppose than native enconding is utf-8 View file encoding with file file -bi filename.txt Change file enconding iconv -f iso-8859-1 -t utf-8 messages_fr.properties > messages_fr_utf-8.properties Escape utf-8 characters with java application native2ascii native2ascii message_fr_utf8.properties messages_fr_ascii.properties Rewrite original messages_fr.properties to ascii References: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iconv http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/technotes/tools/windows/native2ascii.html
